entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Newmarket

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
